entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
